dct_title_s: [Set of maps from the Vulgate Latin Bible]
dct_alternative_sm: Biblia sacra ad optima quaeque veteris, et vulgatae translationis exemplaria summa diligentia, paríque fide castigata: cum Hebraicorum, Caldaeorum & Graecorum nominum interpretatione
dct_description_sm: Coordinates approximate and based on Greenwich meridian.
Shows topography, drainage, places of historical interest.
Indexes, [Sites of historical interest], and descriptive text throughout.
Appears in Biblia sacra : bad optima quaeque veteris, et vulgatae translationis exemplaria summa diligentia, paríque fide castigata: cum Hebraicorum, Caldaeorum & Graecorum nominum interpretatione.

dct_rightsHolder_sm: Images from the Leonard and Juliet Rothman Holy Lands Map Collection courtesy Stanford University Libraries. This item is in the public domain. There are no restrictions on use. If you have questions, please contact the David Rumsey Map Center at rumseymapcenter@stanford.edu
